commute_time.long_description: Self-reported mean travel time to work. Based on American Community Survey Table S0801 ACS 5-year estimates.
commute_time.statement: The mean commute time in {features.name} is {value}.

perc_carpool.long_description: Percentage of population self-reported to carpool to work. Based on American Community Survey Table S0801 ACS 5-year estimates.
perc_carpool.short_description: Population self-reported to carpool to work.
perc_carpool.statement: {value} of the population in {features.name} carpools to work.

perc_no_vehicle.long_description: Percentage of households self-reported to not have a vehicle available at home. Based on American Community Survey Table S2504 ACS 5-year estimates.
perc_no_vehicle.long_name: Percentage of households without vehicle available
perc_no_vehicle.short_description: Households self-reported to not have a vehicle available at home.
perc_no_vehicle.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} do not have a vehicle available at home.
